attr.title: Luck be a Landlord
attr.desc: A roguelike deck-builder about using a slot machine to earn rent money and defeat capitalism. This game does not contain any real-world currency gambling or microtransactions.
attr.desc_md:
A roguelike deck-builder about using a slot machine to earn rent money and defeat capitalism. This game does not contain any real-world currency gambling or microtransactions.

In Luck be a Landlord, you'll use a slot machine to generate symbols that earn you coins. Pay your ever-increasing rent on time or face dire consequences!
attr.inst:
You'll need to purchase the game from `https://store.steampowered.com/app/1404850/Luck_be_a_Landlord`. You'll need a specific release, which you can obtain using a tool like DepotDownloader (https://github.com/SteamRE/DepotDownloader). There are also GUIs for DepotDownloader, like https://depotdownloader.00pium.net. The command may vary depending on your system, but the `-app`, `-depot`, and `manifest` digits must match those below:

`./DepotDownloader -app 1404850 -depot 1404853 -manifest 5385995170406685945 -username <STEAM_USERNAME> -password <STEAM_PASSWORD>`

Once you've grabbed this, locate the *Luck be a Landlord.pck* file and place this in the port's *gamedata* folder.
attr.inst_md:
## Installation Instructions

1. Purchase the game from [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/1404850/Luck_be_a_Landlord/)
2. You'll need a specific release, which you can obtain using a tool like [DepotDownloader](https://github.com/SteamRE/DepotDownloader)
3. There are also GUIs for DepotDownloader, like [this one](https://depotdownloader.00pium.net)
4. Use the following command (substitute with your Steam credentials):
   ```
   ./DepotDownloader -app 1404850 -depot 1404853 -manifest 5385995170406685945 -username <STEAM_USERNAME> -password <STEAM_PASSWORD>
   ```
5. Locate the **Luck be a Landlord.pck** file from the downloaded files
6. Place this file in the port's **gamedata** folder
